p:
The occurrences of 17-mer were counted for the decontaminated clean reads generated from in vivo plant and in vitro plantlets using Jellyfish 2.2.7 [ 70]. The distribution of 17-mer depth and frequency was plotted using Tableau. Genome size, heterozygosity, and repetitive rate were estimated using the Genomeye program developed by Novogene Co., Ltd. Genome size was estimated as follows:
